subject: Download Silent Hunter 4 on Direct2Drive today!
body:

Civilization IV comes to life like never before in a beautifully detailed, living 3D world that elevates the gameplay experience to a whole new level... 
 
Medieval 2: Total War - $49.95
The Golden Age of railroading is back with Sid Meier's Railroads! Combining the best of real-world and model railroads, Sid Meier's Railroads! puts you in charge of building your own railroad empire...


 
 
 
 
 


World of Warcraft - $19.95
Still haven't played World of Warcraft yet? Why not start today and discover what 8 Million other people are enjoying right now?

As the Administration resumes an offensive approach, they prepare for the unthinkable.
 
Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex - Volume 1 - $14.95
Female cyborg Major Motoko Kusanagi and her fellow police officers of Section 9 hunt down a host of criminals in both the real and online worlds.
